concise_definition: n. 观点, 看法, 景色; v. 观看, 认为, 评价

definitions.explanation_en: An opinion, belief, or attitude about a particular subject, often shaped by personal experience, culture, or perspective.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指对某一特定主题的看法、信念或态度，通常由个人经验、文化背景或视角所形成。
definitions.example_en: Her view on climate change is informed by years of scientific research.
definitions.example_cn: 她对气候变化的看法基于多年的科学研究。

definitions.explanation_en: The scene or prospect that can be seen from a particular place, especially a pleasing or wide-ranging landscape.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指从某一特定位置所能看见的景色或视野，尤指优美或开阔的自然景观。
definitions.example_en: The hotel room offered a stunning view of the ocean at sunrise.
definitions.example_cn: 酒店房间在日出时能欣赏到壮丽的海景。

definitions.explanation_en: To look at or observe something, especially with attention or for a period of time.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指观看或观察某物，尤指有意识地或持续地注视。
definitions.example_en: We viewed the artwork at the museum for over an hour.
definitions.example_cn: 我们在博物馆里观看了那件艺术品一个多小时。

definitions.explanation_en: To regard or consider something in a particular way; to perceive or interpret.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指以某种方式看待或理解某事物；即对某事物进行感知或解释。
definitions.example_en: Many people view success as a measure of personal worth.
definitions.example_cn: 许多人将成功视为个人价值的衡量标准。

comparison.analysis: “Opinion”（意见）更侧重于主观判断或偏好，通常带有情感色彩，常用于表达个人立场，如“in my opinion”。而 “view” 更中性，可指理性思考后的立场，也常用于正式语境，如“public view”或“academic view”。
“Perspective”（视角）强调观察事物的立场或框架，常涉及认知结构或背景差异，如文化、专业或历史视角。它比 “view” 更抽象、更系统化，常用于分析性语境。而 “view” 更通用，可指具体看法或视觉景象。
“Sight”（景象）专指视觉上看到的物体或风景，是纯粹的感官体验，如“The sight of the mountains was breathtaking”。而 “view” 不仅可指视觉景象，还可引申为抽象看法，且常暗示观察者的位置或选择性视角，如“a panoramic view”。
